publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2052 Chris Ballance: Gandhi International Peace Award—That the Parliament congratulates Helen Steven and Ellen Moxley on being awarded the prestigious Gandhi International Peace Award and applauds their commitment to campaigning for peace and the non-violent resolution of conflict displayed over many years.

S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Mark Ballard*, Rob Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Marlyn Glen*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-2052 Chris Ballance: Gandhi International Peace Award—That the Parliament congratulates Helen Steven and Ellen Moxley on being awarded the prestigious Gandhi International Peace Award and applauds their commitment to campaigning for peace and the non-violent resolution of conflict displayed over many years. Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Patrick Harvie, Mike Pringle, Mark Ballard, Rob Gibson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Tommy Sheridan, Marlyn Glen, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2052 Gandhi International Peace Award (lodged on 23 November 2004) Elaine Smith*
